property.name: dfs.kerberos.enabled
property.description: Kerberos authentication status for CTDFS.Valid values are: true or false.

property.name: dfs.merge.keytab.host
property.description: The selected host for merging keytabs and initializing CTDFS.If kerberos authentication status is false(dfs.kerberos.enabled=false),this item can be filled by 'NULL'.Otherwise,please fill in domain name.

property.name: kadmin.local.principal
property.description: The principal is used to add the kerberos database administrator. e.g:root/admin

property.name: kadmin.local.password
property.description: The password is used to add the kerberos database administrator
